titles.title: US-Israel Global Neuroscience Partnership Act of 2014
To provide for the establishment of a grant program to support United States-Israeli cooperation for neuroscience-related research, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary:
4/10/2014--Introduced. US-Israel Global Neuroscience Partnership Act of 2014 - Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services (HHS) to award grants to eligible entities for U.S.-Israel cooperative neuroscience research.
Establishes in the National Institutes of Health (NIH) an International Neuroscience-Related Research Advisory Board.
Terminates the grant program and the Advisory Board seven years after the date of enactment of this Act.
